itunes:title: Episode 086: Colin McKay (feat. Sam Guido)
title: Episode 086: Colin McKay (feat. Sam Guido)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 86 of CEREBRO, Connor and Sam Guido roar into battle with the courageous Kylun, Hero of the People! Created by Alan Davis, little Colin McKay was a mutant child on the run when he was transported to the mystical world of Ee'rath. After growing into the warrior Kylun, he returned home and joined Excalibur. Most recently, he was a regular cast member in Tini Howard and Bob Quinn's Knights of X.

The CEREBRO character file on Kylun begins at 1:06:05.

(Content Advisory: Colin's story is... honestly pretty wholesome, actually.)

You can support CEREBRO on Patreon!

Grateful to SkillShare for sponsoring the podcast this month. Visit skillshare.com/CEREBRO today to get your first month FREE! 



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
